What happens to the investigator's memories after being robbed?
Their memories will slowly return to them over time.

What is the outcome if the investigator was carrying a Trea- sured Possession when robbed?
Make a Luck roll to see if it was stolen.

1D10 hours later.

One penalty die on all dice rolls until the obsession has been indulged.

What happens to an investigator's hit points after going insane?
Hit points are reduced to half of what they were before going insane.

Their actions may or may not be apparent or remembered.

A phobia is a lasting irrational fear of something.

The Keeper may select randomly (roll 1D100) or choose an appropriate one.
